message: The REG_AGG field for indicator 5-a-1, translated into all languages

data.en: Weighted regional aggregates will be generated only if a sufficient number of countries in the region report on the indicator. This will be the case if (1) at least 50 percent of countries have a value or (2) if enough countries have a value as to cover 50 percent of the population in the region.
data.fr: Des agrégats régionaux pondérés ne seront générés que si un nombre suffisant de pays de la région rendent compte de l’indicateur.
